name: chicken wing thing
description:
Thanks for playing "chicken wing thing"! 

The goal of the game is to avoid the eggs at all costs, because touching one will make it break, killing the chicken and its to-be children who are inside the eggs.

Controls:

Keyboard:

  • W- Jump
  • A- Left
  • D- Right
  • S- No use.

Mobile: 

  • Left Arrow- Left
  • Right Arrow- Right
  • A Button- Jump

Have FUn!
